sentences.en: Ben sat up quickly, his face taut and terrified.
sentences.cn: 本一骨碌坐了起来，表情紧张而惊恐。
凯瑟琳本人也很消瘦,紧张.

sentences.en: He waved his arm at the taut wire of the horizon.
sentences.cn: 他挥臂指向笔直的地平线.

sentences.en: I gave one desperate pull at the taut tow - rope to bring the boat alongside.
sentences.cn: 我拼命拉住那根绷紧的缆绳,想把小艇拉过来.

sentences.en: In this taut, subtle novel Hawthorne solves almost all his problems.
sentences.cn: 在这部紧张而又难以捉摸的小说里,霍桑几乎解决了他所有的问题.

sentences.en: Pull the line taut to prevent it from knotting up.
She began to hear her own taut, shallow breathing.
sentences.cn: 她开始听见自己急促、微弱的呼吸。

sentences.en: She stopped and slipped aside into the shadows, every sense alert and taut.
sentences.cn: 她站在暗处不动, 满身是耳朵,满身是眼睛.

sentences.en: The clothes line is pulled taut and secured.
The lovely mouth was taut with irony.
sentences.cn: 漂亮的嘴讥讽地绷紧着.

sentences.en: The skin of the drum is taut.
When muscles are taut or cold there is more chance of injury or strain.
sentences.cn: 肌肉绷紧或受凉时更容易损伤。

sentences.en: Xiangzi sat down jerkily, his muscles taut.

trans.tran_cn: 紧的，绷紧的，整洁的，整齐的，紧张的
